enjug.erijan.games.yatzy.view

Class YatzyGui

  • java.lang.Object
    • enjug.erijan.games.yatzy.view.YatzyGui
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericObserver<GameState>

    public class YatzyGui
extends java.lang.Object
implements GenericObserver<GameState>

    GUI wrapper for any kind of Yatzy game. Built from four separate panels: Score, Dice, Buttons and Info.

    Created by Jan Eriksson on 03/11/15.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      YatzyGui(GameControl gameControl, ScoreInterface scoreInterface, DiceHandler diceHandler, GameState gameState)
      Creates all the panels and places them in a GridBagLayout.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(GameState subjectRef)

        Unsets current player column before getting next player. Set current player to actual current player according to GameState. Mark current player column.
        Enable/disable roll and score button.

        Specified by:
        update in interface GenericObserver<GameState>
        Parameters:
        subjectRef - Game state model.
